mapper.sql: id, ship_name AS shipName, imo, inspection_type AS inspectionType, delivery, delivery_other AS deliveryOther, re_delivery AS reDelivery, re_delivery_other AS reDeliveryOther, port, start_date AS startDate, estimated_date AS estimatedDate, end_date AS endDate, email, role, role_other AS roleOther, special_requirement AS specialRequirement, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag
